Question
========

Suppose the probability of a student completing Chemistry is 2/3 and English is 4/9. The probability that she will complete at least one subject is 4/5. Then what is the probability that she will complete both subjects?

Answerlist
----------

* 14/45
* 41105
* 29/45
* 42/45

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 14/45: Correct
* 41105: Incorrect
* 29/45: Incorrect
* 42/45: Incorrect
